revision.text:
{{Use mdy dates|date=May 2012}} {{pp-semi-blp|small=yes}}{{pp-move-indef}} {{Infobox person | name = Kim Kardashian | image = Kim_Kardashian_2011.jpg | image_size = | caption = Kim Kardashian Fragrance Launch, Glendale, CA on February 22, 2011 | birth_name = Kimberly Noel Kardashian | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1980|10|21|mf=yes}} | birth_place = Los Angeles, California, U.S. | nationality = American | religion = | Net worth = {{profit}} $35 million | years_active = 2007–present | occupation = Businesswoman, socialite, television personality, model, actress | height = {{Height|ft=5|in=2.5}} | television = ''[[Keeping Up with the Kardashians]]''
''[[Kourtney and Kim Take New York]]'' | spouse = [[Damon Thomas (record producer)|Damon Thomas]]
(2000–2004)
[[Kris Humphries]]
(2011–present; filed for divorce) | parents = [[Robert Kardashian]] (father)
[[Kris Jenner]] (mother)
[[Bruce Jenner]] (stepfather) | relatives = [[Kourtney Kardashian|Kourtney]] (sister)
[[Khloé Kardashian|Khloé]] (sister)
[[Rob Kardashian|Rob]] (brother)
[[Kylie Jenner]] (half-sister)
[[Kendall Jenner]] (half-sister) | website = {{URL|http://kimkardashian.celebuzz.com}} | box_width = 250px }} '''Kimberly Noel''' "'''Kim'''" '''Kardashian'''http://www.actressarchives.com/celebrities/kim-kardashian | (born October 21, 1980{{cite web|url=http://search.people.com/results.html?Ntt=kim%20kardashian&searchSubmit.y=0&bu=&searchSubmit.x=0l|title=Kim Kardashian Biography|publisher=[[People (magazine)|People.com]] |date=undated|accessdate=October 31, 2011}}) is an American socialite, reality television star, model and occasional actress of [[Armenian people|Armenian]] desent. She is known for starring in ''[[Keeping Up with the Kardashians]]'', the [[E!]] reality series that she shares with her family, and its spin-offs including ''[[Kourtney and Kim Take New York]]''.{{cite web|url=http://www.usanewsweek.com/news/Kim-Kardashian-With-Sister-Kourtney--Takes-Reality-Show-To-New-York-1286307938/ |title=Kim Kardashian With Sister Kourtney, Takes Reality Show To New York |publisher=Usanewsweek.com |date=October 5, 2010 |accessdate=July 3, 2011}} Prior to the development of her career as a reality television star, Kardashian gained notoriety as the subject of a [[sex tape]] that subsequently resulted in a court awarding her $5 million. She has been involved in the production of several lines of clothing and fragrances. In 2010, she was the highest earning reality star, with estimated earnings of $6 million. In August 2011, Kardashian married basketball player [[Kris Humphries]] in a widely publicized ceremony. In October 2011, Kardashian filed for divorce. ==Life and career== ===Early life=== Kardashian was born in Los Angeles, California, the daughter of attorney [[Robert Kardashian]] and his wife [[Kris Jenner|Kris Kardashian]] (née Houghton). Her father was a third generation [[Armenian American]]. Her paternal great-grandparents, Sam and Harom Kardaschoff, were ethnic [[Armenians|Armenian]] [[Molokans|Molokan Jumpers]] from Karakale, [[Kars Oblast|Kars]], Russian Empire (now [[Turkey]]). They migrated to the United States in 1913, just before the [[Armenian Genocide]].{{cite news | title = Kim Kardashian is keeping up with the Armenians | first = Oliver | last = Harvey | url = http://www.thesun.co.uk/sol/homepage/features/3973452/Kim-Kardashian-is-keeping-up-with-the-Armenians.html | agency = The Sun | date = March 16, 2012 | accessdate = September 3, 2012}} Her mother is of [[Dutch people|Dutch]] and Scottish descent.{{cite web|url=http://kimkardashian.celebuzz.com/2008/06/11/monuments_and_momentous_times/ |title=Monuments and momentous times in Monte Carlo – Kim Kardashian videos, photos and blog: Official website |publisher=Kimkardashian.celebuzz.com |date=June 11, 2008 |accessdate=July 3, 2011}} Kardashian has two sisters, [[Kourtney Kardashian|Kourtney]] and Khloé, and one brother, [[Rob Kardashian|Robert]]. She has stepbrothers Burton Jenner, Brandon Jenner, and reality TV star [[Brody Jenner]], step-sister Casey Jenner, and half-sisters [[Kendall Jenner]] and [[Kylie Jenner]].{{cite news|last=Buckman| first=Adam| title=Caught on Tape: Kim Kardashian Goes Home With Her Family | date =October 4, 2007 |url =http://www.nypost.com/seven/10142007/tv/caught_on_tape.htm |work=New York Post |accessdate =February 22, 2008}} She graduated from [[Marymount High School]] in 1998.{{cite news|url=http://movies.nytimes.com/person/1457148/Kim-Kardashian/biography|title=Kim Kardashian Biography|work=New York Times|accessdate=August 30, 2010}} In 2000, Kardashian married music producer [[The Underdogs (duo)|Damon Thomas]]; their relationship ended in divorce in 2004. Subsequently she dated [[Contemporary R&B|R&B]] singer [[Ray J]], [[NFL]] star [[Reggie Bush]]{{cite news|url=http://www.gq.com/women/photos/200903/new-orleans-reggie-bush-running-back-kim-kardashian|title=The Saint and The Sinner|publisher=GQ Magazine|date=March 2009|accessdate=August 30, 2010}} and [[Dallas Cowboys]] wide receiver [[Miles Austin]].{{cite web|author=Kim Kardashian |url=http://www.eonline.com/uberblog/hwood_party_girl/b194764_kim_kardashian_im_definitely_dating.html |title=Kim Kardashian: I'm "Definitely Dating" Miles Austin |publisher=E! Online |date=August 11, 2010 |accessdate=October 30, 2010}} She also dated model [[Gabriel Aubry]].{{cite web|last=Garcia |first=Jennifer |url=http://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20447708,00.html |title=Kim Kardashian and Gabriel Aubry Split – Breakups, Gabriel Aubry, Kim Kardashian |work=People |date=December 7, 2010 |accessdate=July 3, 2011}} ===2003–07: Controversy and reality television=== In February 2007, a [[Celebrity sex tape|home sex video]] that she made with singer [[Ray J]] in 2003{{cite journal | title="Kim Kardashian Superstar Featuring Ray J" 18 U.S.C. 2257 Compliance Records | author=S Hirsch | journal=Vivid Entertainment LLC. – 18 U.S.C. 2257 Compliance Records | year=2007}} was leaked.{{cite web|url= http://www.hiphoppress.com/2007/02/vivid_entertain.html|title= Vivid Entertainment Spends $1-Million To Acquire Notorious Video 'Starring' Sexy Socialite Kim Kardashian And Hip Hop Star Ray J|accessdate=October 6, 2008|author=[[Vivid Entertainment]]|date= February 7, 2007|publisher=Hip Hop Press}} [[Vivid Entertainment]] bought the rights for $1 million and released the film as ''Kim Kardashian: Superstar'' on February 21. Kardashian sued Vivid for ownership of the tape. In late April 2007, Kardashian dropped the suit and [[Settlement (litigation)|settled]] with Vivid Entertainment for $5 million.{{cite news |last=Johnson| first=Richard |title=Happy Ending |work=New York Post | date =May 1, 2007 | url =http://www.nypost.com/seven/05012007/gossip/pagesix/happy_ending_pagesix_.htm |accessdate=February 26, 2008}} Kardashian was a friend of [[Paris Hilton]], who introduced her to the socialite scene.[http://www.usmagazine.com/celebritynews/news/kim-kardashian-and-paris-hilton-end-their-feud-2011162 Kim Kardashian and Paris Hilton End Their Feud – UsMagazine.com] Her first acting role was in the television series ''[[Beyond the Break]]''. In October 2007, along with her two sisters, mother, brother, half-sisters, and stepfather she starred in the [[E!]] television series, ''[[Keeping Up with the Kardashians]]''. As of October 2011, the series has aired 69 episodes over six seasons. ===2007–10: Modeling and retail=== [[File:Kim_Kardashian_2009.jpg|thumb|upright|Kardashian in Santa Monica, California on May 13, 2009 at Maxim's 10th Annual Hot 100 Celebration]] Kardashian co-owns a clothing boutique called D-A-S-H with her sisters Kourtney and Khloé. In December 2007, Kardashian posed nude for ''[[Playboy]]''.{{cite web|url=http://www.playboy.com/girls/celebrities/features/magazine/kim-kardashian/kim-kardashian.html |title=Kim Kardashian Playboy – Kim Kardashian Nude – Pics and Videos of the Sex Tape Celebrity |publisher=Playboy.com |date=January 27, 2009 |accessdate=June 2, 2010}} In February 2008, Bongo Jeans announced that she would be their face model.{{cite web|url=http://news.lalate.com/2008/02/13/kim-kardashian-bongo-jeans-picture-kim-kardashian-model-ad-campaign-bongo/ |title=kim kardashian, model, bongo, bongo jeans, picture, photo |publisher=News.lalate.com |date=February 13, 2008 |accessdate=June 2, 2010}} She has also modeled for [[Carl's Jr.]], Sugar Factory lollipops, and various other products.{{cite news|url=http://latimesblogs.latimes.com/alltherage/2010/02/kim-kardashian-and-products-endorsements-perfume-nascar-cupcakes-candles-and-more.html|title=All the Rage: Kardashian Endorsements Seem to Have Va-Va-Vroom|work=Los Angeles Times|date=February 26, 2010|accessdate=August 30, 2010}}{{cite news|url=http://www.forbes.com/2010/04/13/reality-tv-celebrity-fame-forbes-woman-entrepreneurs-business.html|title=Reality TV Stars Turned Entrepreneurs|work=Forbes|date=April 13, 2010|accessdate=August 30, 2010|first=Jenna|last=Goudreau}} Kardashian starred in the 2008 disaster film spoof ''[[Disaster Movie]]'' as Lisa, and appeared in the ''[[How I Met Your Mother]]'' episode "[[Benefits (How I Met Your Mother)|Benefits]]". She also appeared on the Season 3 premiere of the series [[90210 (season 3)|''90210'']] with her sisters Khloé and Kourtney; they all played themselves.{{cite web|url=http://www.tvguide.com/News/90210-Kardashian-Sisters-1020039.aspx|title=Kardashian Sisters Land 90210 Cameo|publisher=TVGuide.com}} Kardashian was a guest hostess of [[WrestleMania XXIV]] and appeared as a guest judge during Cycle 13 of ''[[America's Next Top Model]]''.{{cite news | author=Gina DiNunno | title=Lauren Conrad and Kim Kardashian to Guest Judge Top Model | url=http://www.tvguide.com/News/Lauren-Conrad-Kim-1008663.aspx | work=TVGuide.com | date=August 4, 2009 | accessdate=August 4, 2009}} On December 16, 2009, Kardashian made a guest star appearance on CBS's ''[[CSI: NY]]'' with [[Vanessa Minnillo]].{{cite news | author=Kate Stanhope | title= Kim Kardashian and Vanessa Minnillo to Appear on CSI:NY| url=http://www.tvguide.com/News/Kardashian-Minnillo-CSI-1011580.aspx| work=TVGuide.com}} In 2009 she had a cameo as club bouncer in the 2009 porn film spoof ''[[Deep in the Valley]]''{{cite news|title=Kim Kardashian gościnnie w serialu|url=http://kultura.dziennik.pl/telewizja-i-seriale/artykuly/373814,kim-kardashian-goscinnie-w-serialu.html|accessdate=January 16, 2012|date=January 4, 2010|publisher=dziennik.pl|ref=harv}} Kardashian was one of 13 participants on the [[Dancing with the Stars (U.S. season 7)|seventh season]] of ''Dancing with the Stars''.{{cite web|url=http://www.people.com/people/kim_kardashian/biography/0,,20185121_10,00.html|title=Kim Kardashian Biography|work=People |accessdate=October 12, 2008}} She was partnered with [[Mark Ballas]] and was the third contestant voted off the show on September 30, 2008, finishing in 11th place overall.{{cite web|url=http://abclocal.go.com/kgo/story?section=news/entertainment&id=6424586|title=Kim Kardashian gets voted off 'Dancing'|date=September 30, 2008|publisher=abclocal.go.com|accessdate=October 12, 2008}} {{Dead link|date=October 2010|bot=H3llBot}} Sanford Siegal, the creator of the [[Cookie diet|Cookie Diet]], sued Kardashian, claiming she [[defamation|defamed]] him on Twitter. According to Siegal, Kardashian tweeted in October 2009 that he was "falsely promoting" that she was on the cookie diet. Siegal filed a claim in a Florida state court claiming the statements are false and defamatory. He also alleges that Kardashian was on QuickTrim's payroll when she posted the tweet. Kardashian's tweet appears to stem from an article on CookieDiet.com, that named Kardashian as one of many celebrities who saw positive results on the diet. Kardashian sent a cease-and-desist order to Siegal, demanding the link be removed.{{cite news | author=Gina DiNunno | title=Kim Kardashian Sued by Cookie Diet Doc Over a Tweet| url=http://www.tvguide.com/News/Kim-Kardashian-Sued-1013430.aspx| work=TVGuide.com}} Kardashian released her own fragrance product in 2010.{{cite news|url=http://www.thestar.com/living/article/801349--kardashian-fame-and-fragrance|title=Kardashian Fame and Fragrance|work=Toronto Star|date=April 28, 2010|accessdate=August 30, 2010 | first=Trish | last=Crawford}} In March 2009, Kardashian launched an endorsement with ''ShoeDazzle'' shopping,[http://stylenews.peoplestylewatch.com/2009/03/20/kick-it-with-kims-new-budget-friendly-shoe-club-2/ Kick It With Kim's New Shoe Shopping Service] People, March 20, 2009 of which she is the co-founder and chief fashion stylist. The following month on April 9, 2009, Kardashian released a workout DVD series, ''Fit In Your Jeans By Friday,'' with trainers Jennifer Galardi and Patrick Goudeau.{{cite news|url=http://blogs.forbes.com/face-to-face/2010/07/01/kim-kardashian-powering-to-the-top/|title=Kim Kardashian Powering To The Top|work=Forbes|date=July 1, 2010|accessdate=August 30, 2010|first=Mia|last=Saini}}{{cite news|url=http://www.allure.com/beauty/blogs/reporter/2009/04/sweatin-with-kim-kardashian.html|title=Sweatin' with Kim Kardashian|publisher=Allure Magazine|date=April 14, 2009|accessdate=August 30, 2010}}{{dead link|date=July 2011}} In September 2009, Fusion Beauty and [[Seven Bar Foundation]] launched "Kiss Away Poverty", with Kardashian as the face of the campaign. For every LipFusion lipgloss sold, $1 went to the Foundation to fund women entrepreneurs in the US.{{cite web|url=http://www.sevenbarfoundation.org/media/fusion-beauty/ |title=Fusion Beauty |publisher=Seven Bar Foundation |accessdate=July 3, 2011}} She has also been featured in numerous international editions of ''[[FHM]]'', including the cover of the April 2010 Australian edition and the UK March 2011 edition.{{cite web|url=http://www.fhm.com/girls/covergirls/kim-kardashian |title=Kim Kardashian in FHM |publisher=FHM.com |accessdate=December 15, 2010}} Famous Cupcakes, a Los Angeles bakery, created a vanilla cupcake mix for Kardashian. The cupcake flavor is called Va-Va-Va-Nilla. Kardashian has also created jewelry along with her sisters, Khloé and Kourtney. They produced a collection for ''Virgins, Saints, and Angels'' in 2010.{{cite news|url=http://articles.latimes.com/2010/may/02/image/la-ig-celebjewels-20100502|title=Celebrities and Jewelry: Learning Their Lines|work=Los Angeles Times|date=May 2, 2010|accessdate=August 30, 2010 | first1=Booth | last1=Moore | first2=Fashion | last2=Critic}} Again with her sisters, Kardashian has released various clothing lines. One called K-Dash was to be sold on [[QVC]] in 2010,{{cite news|url=http://nymag.com/daily/fashion/2010/08/the_kardashians_collaborated_w.html|title=The Kardashians Collaborated With Janie Bryant on a Clothing Line|publisher=New York Magazine|date=August 27, 2010|accessdate=August 30, 2010}} and in the same year they produced a range for [[Bebe stores|Bebe]].{{cite news|url=http://www.nydailynews.com/gossip/2009/10/17/2009-10-17_kardashian_clothing_line_soon_to_be_a_reality.html|title=Kardashian Sisters Team Up with Bebe to Create Clothing Line|work=New York Daily News|date=October 21, 2009|accessdate=August 30, 2010 | first=Joe | last=Dziemianowicz}}{{cite news|url=http://www.chron.com/disp/story.mpl/life/style/7002405.html|title=Kardashian Sisters Get Stylish and Sexy with Bebe|work=The Houston Chronicle|date=May 13, 2010|accessdate=August 30, 2010}}{{cite news|url=http://www.pbpulse.com/tv/reality-tv/2010/02/16/kardashians-show-off-legs-in-bebe-collaboration/#more-43666|title=Kardashians Show Off Legs in Bebe Collaboration|publisher=Palm Beach Post|date=February 16, 2010|accessdate=August 30, 2010}} As of August 2011 they are creating another for [[Sears]], called the ''Kardashian Kollection''.{{cite web|last=Spencer|first=Lara|title=Inside the Kardashian Empire: Kim, Khloe and Kourtney Talk Life, Career, Love|url=http://abcnews.go.com/Entertainment/kardashian-empire-kim-khloe-kourtney-talk-life-career/story?id=14251638|publisher=ABC News|accessdate=August 19, 2011}} In addition, Kardashian and her sisters created a sunless tanner called Kardashian Glamour Tan in 2010.{{cite news|url=http://www.nytimes.com/2010/06/03/fashion/03skin.html?scp=14&sq=kim%20kardashian&st=cse|title=‘Jersey Shore,’ Without the Sun|work=The New York Times|date=June 2, 2010|accessdate=August 30, 2010 | first=Douglas | last=Quenqua}} On July 1, 2010, the New York City branch of [[Madame Tussauds]] revealed a wax figure of Kardashian.{{cite news|url=http://www.nydailynews.com/gossip/2010/07/02/2010-07-02_kim_kardashian_unveils_wax_statue_lookalike_at_madam_tussauds_in_times_square.html|title=Seeing double! Kim Kardashian Unveils Wax Statue Lookalike at Madam Tussauds in Times Square|work=New York Daily News|date=2010=07-02|accessdate=August 30, 2010 | first=Nick | last=Klopsis}} ===2010–present: Marriage and other projects=== Kardashian is the producer of ''The Spin Crowd'', a reality television show about ''Command PR'', a New York City [[public relations]] firm, run by Jonathan Cheban and Simon Huck. The show follows them as they settle into their new offices in Los Angeles. Kardashian is friends with both, specifically Cheban, and frequently appears on her reality shows. She also appeared at the 2010 MTV VMAs on September 12, 2010.{{cite web|url= http://www.tvguide.com/celebrities/kim-kardashian/292941|title = Kim Kardashian|date=September 9, 2010|publisher=TVGuide.com }} She also appeared in and was the subject and judge of a task on [[The Apprentice (U.S. season 10)#Episode 9: Fragrant Disregard|the ninth episode]] of Season 10 of ''The Apprentice'' in 2010; the two teams had to create an in-store display for her new perfume line, to be sold at Perfumania.{{cite web|url= http://www.movieweb.com/tv/TEzLMEr1MQqEDE/kim-kardashian-visits-octane|title = MovieWeb: "The Apprentice (2004–present): In-Store Display Challenge: Kim Kardashian Visits Octane"|date=November 12, 2010|publisher=MovieWeb.com }}{{cite web|url= http://entertainment.gather.com/viewArticle.action?articleId=281474978687994|title = The Apprentice, Kim Kardashian's Perfume Brings Out Best and Worst|date=November 12, 2010|publisher=Gather.com }} Kim, Kourtney, and Khloé wrote an autobiography entitled ''Kardashian Konfidential'', which was released in stores on November 23, 2010.{{cite news|url=http://www.glamour.com/sex-love-life/blogs/smitten/2010/06/keeping-up-with-kim-kourtney-a.html|title=Keeping Up With Kim, Kourtney and Khloé: The Kardashian Sisters Are Writing a Book!|publisher=Glamour Magazine|date=June 18, 2010|accessdate=August 30, 2010}} [[File:Kim Kardashian 4.JPG|thumb|upright|Kardashian at the Style Your Slim event.]] In April 2010, Kardashian sparked controversy over the way she held a cat for a photograph.{{cite news| url=http://www.cbsnews.com/stories/2010/04/20/entertainment/main6414472.shtml | work=CBS News | title=Kim Kardashian Sparks Controversy Over Cat Photo}} The same year, animal rights organization [[PETA]] criticized Kardashian for repeatedly wearing fur coats, and named her as one of the five worst people or organizations of 2010 when it came to animal welfare.{{cite news |title=PETA Has Bone To Pick With Kim Kardashian |publisher=[[Popcrunch]] | date =November 17, 2010 | url =http://www.popcrunch.com/peta-has-bone-to-pick-with-kim-kardashian/ |accessdate=December 14, 2010}} In June 2010, ''[[The Guardian]]'' commented on her ability to attract payments of up to US$10,000 from sponsors for each [[Twitter|tweet]] that she broadcasts.{{Cite news|newspaper=The Guardian |location=London |date=June 6, 2011 |page=2 (G2 section) |title=Repair the finances}} In December 2010, Kardashian filmed a music video for a song titled "[[Jam (Turn It Up)]]". The video was directed by [[Hype Williams]]; [[Kanye West]] makes a cameo in the video.{{cite web|url=http://www.tmz.com/2010/12/29/kim-kardashian-music-video-with-kanye-west-hype-williams-the-dream-shoot/?utm_source=twitterfeed&utm_medium=twitter |title=Kim Kardashian Locks Down Kanye for Music Video |publisher=TMZ.com |date=December 29, 2010 |accessdate=July 3, 2011}} Kardashian premiered the song during a New Year's Eve party at TAO Las Vegas on December 31, 2010.{{cite web|url=http://www.rap-up.com/2011/01/02/kim-kardashian-debuts-the-dream-penned-single-in-vegas/ |title=Kim Kardashian Debuts The-Dream-Penned Single in Vegas |publisher=Rap-Up.com |accessdate=July 3, 2011}} The song was produced by [[The-Dream]] and [[Christopher Stewart (music producer)|Tricky Stewart]]. When asked if an album is in the works, Kardashian replied, "There's no album in the works or anything—just one song we did for ''[[Kourtney and Kim Take New York]]'', and a video Hype Williams directed, half of the proceeds we're giving away to a cancer foundation, because The-Dream's and one of my parents passed away from cancer. It's just all having fun—with a good cause".{{cite web|url=http://www.billboard.com/news#/news/kim-kardashian-there-s-no-album-in-the-works-1004139735.story |title=Latest Music News, Band, Artist, Musician & Music Video News |work=Billboard |date=February 7, 2011 |accessdate=July 3, 2011}} Jim Farber, writing for the ''[[Daily News (New York)|Daily News]]'', called the song a "dead-brained piece of generic dance music, without a single distinguishing feature," and suggested that the single made Kardashian the "worst singer in the reality TV universe."{{cite news|last=Farber|first=Jim|title=Kim Kardashian song 'Jam (Turn It Up)' makes her the worst singer in the reality TV universe|url=http://articles.nydailynews.com/2011-03-02/entertainment/28666720_1_kim-kardashian-jam-reality|accessdate=March 8, 2011|newspaper=Daily News |location=New York |date=March 2, 2011}} Kardashian's 2010 earnings were the highest among Hollywood-based reality stars, being estimated at $6 million.Dorian, John. "[http://au.ibtimes.com/articles/89368/20101207/kim-kardashian-top-earning-reality-star-for-year-2010.htm Kim Kardashian top-earning reality star for year 2010]". ''[http://au.ibtimes.com/ International Business Times AU]'', December 7, 2010. Kardashian has supported the recognition of the [[Armenian Genocide]] on numerous occasions and has encouraged [[Barack Obama]] and the [[United States government]] to consider its acknowledgement. On April 21, 2011, a few days before the 96th anniversary of the Armenian Genocide, she wrote about the issue on her blog in an effort to put it under spotlight and also sent a tweet to her fans urging [[Armenian Genocide recognition|its recognition]].{{cite news |title=‘Time to Recognize the Armenian Genocide,’ Says Kim Kardashian |publisher=[[Asbarez]] | date =April 21, 2011 | url =http://asbarez.com/95342/kim-kardashian-blogs-tweets-about-obama-protest-%E2%80%98national-day-of-prayer%E2%80%99/ |accessdate=May 11, 2011}} Kardashian began dating NBA player [[Kris Humphries]] of the [[New Jersey Nets]] in October 2010. They became engaged in May 2011,{{cite news |url=http://www.mtv.com/news/articles/1673479/kim-kardashian-kris-humphries-timeline.jhtml?utm_source=feedburner&utm_medium=feed&utm_campaign=Feed%3A+MTVNewsLatest+%28MTV+News+Latest+Headlines%29|title=Kim Kardashian And Kris Humphries: A Timeline|first=Jocelyn |last=Vena |date=October 31, 2011 |accessdate=October 31, 2011}} and married on August 20, 2011, in [[Montecito, California]].{{cite news |url=http://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20521390,00.html |title=Kim Kardashian and Kris Humphries Are Married!|first=Jennifer |last=Garcia |date=August 20, 2011 |accessdate=August 21, 2011}} A two-part TV special showing the preparations and the wedding itself aired on ''E!'' in early October 2011, amidst what the ''Washington Post'' called a "media blitz" related to the wedding.{{cite news |url=http://www.washingtonpost.com/blogs/celebritology/post/kim-kardashian-wedding-special-to-air-this-sunday-will-you-watch-video/2011/10/07/gIQATLFQTL_blog.html |title=Kim Kardashian wedding special to air this Sunday: Will you watch?|first=Sarah Anne |last=Hughes |date=October 7, 2011 |accessdate=December 2, 2011 |work=The Washington Post}} After 72 days of marriage, Kardashian filed for divorce from Humphries on October 31, 2011, citing irreconcilable differences.{{cite web|title=Kim Kardashian to file for divorce from Kris Humphries|url=http://www.tmz.com/2011/10/31/kim-kardashian-divorce-kris-humphries-files/|work=TMZ.com}} After filing for the divorce, Kardashian asked the court to order Humphries to pay his own legal expenses.{{cite web|title=Kim Kardashian Divorcing Kris Humphries and Doesn’t Want to Pay His Attorney Fees | url=http://www.louislsternberglaw.com/wordpress/2011/10/31/kim-kardashian-divorcing-kris-humphries-pay-counsel-fees/|accessdate=November 4, 2011}} On December 1, 2011, Humphries filed his response to Kardashian's petition, requesting an annulment on the grounds of fraud or if the court will not grant an annulment, a decree of legal separation rather than Kardashian's requested divorce.{{cite news|title=Kris Humphries' Annulment Filing: Read It Here Now!|url=http://ca.eonline.com/news/kris_humphries_annulment_filing_read_it/277969|publisher=E Online |date=December 1, 2011 |accessdate=December 2, 2011}} Several news outlets have surmised that Kardashian's marriage to Humphries was merely a publicity stunt to promote the Kardashian family's brand and their subsequent television ventures.{{cite news|title=Was Kardashian marriage a sham?|url=http://www.chicagotribune.com/video/breaking/chi-video-was-kim-kardashian-marriage-divorce-a-sham-20111101,0,7143953.htmlstory|work=Chicago Tribune |date=November 1, 2011 |accessdate=November 1, 2011}} Her former publicist has also claimed that her short-lived wedding was indeed staged and a ploy to generate money. Kardashian has since filed suit against him, saying his claims were untrue.{{cite news| url=http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2011/11/14/kim-kardashian-suing-ex-publicist-jonathan-jaxson_n_1092652.html |work=Huffington Post | first=Stephanie | last=Marcus | title=Kim Kardashian Suing Ex-Publicist Jonathan Jaxson | date=November 14, 2011}} A widely circulated petition asking to remove all Kardashian related programing off the air has been followed since their split.{{cite web|url=http://abcnews.go.com/blogs/entertainment/2011/11/thousands-sign-no-more-kardashian-petition/ |title=Thousands Sign ‘No More Kardashian’ Petition – ABC News |publisher=Abcnews.go.com |date=2011-11-16 |accessdate=2012-07-26}} In March 2012, Kardashian and her sisters Kourtney and Khloe were named in a $5 million class action lawsuit against QuickTrim, the weight loss supplement they endorse.{{cite web|url=http://abcnews.go.com/blogs/entertainment/2012/03/kardashian-sisters-sued-over-endorsement-of-weight-loss-product/ |title=Kardashian Sisters Sued over Endorsement of Weight-Loss Product – ABC News |publisher=Abcnews.go.com |date=2012-03-05 |accessdate=2012-07-26}} The complaint, filed in the [[United States District Court for the Southern District of New York]], accuses the Kardashians (along with QuickTrim’s manufacturer, Windmill Health Products; the retailer GNC; and others in the sales and marketing chain) of false and deceptive marketing of the diet aid. The plaintiffs, hailing from several states, brought claims under their respective states’ consumer protection laws. {{cite web |title=In Time for Bikini Season, Kardashians Face Lawsuit Over Endorsement of Diet Aids |url= http://www.natlawreview.com/article/time-bikini-season-kardashians-face-lawsuit-over-endorsement-diet-aids|publisher=Ifrah Law |work=The National Law Review|date=2012-07-08|accessdate=2012-07-09}} Kardashian is expected to be a part of the Indian reality show ''[[Bigg Boss]]'' for season 6.{{cite web |url= http://www.invectura.com/kim-kardashian-to-join-bigg-boss-season-6/ |title=Kim Kardashian to Join Bigg Boss season 6 |work=http://www.invectura.com}}{{cite news| url= http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/tv/Kim-Kardashian-in-Bigg-Boss-season-6/articleshow/14206183.cms| title= Kim Kardashian in Bigg Boss season 6?| date=18 June 2012}} ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
